channel.title: Creating an Account Crashes client [508]
channel.description:
When ever you first make a new account it crashes what ever client you use. But if you try to log in a 2nd time it lets you connect with no problem. If you need to see any files just tell me and ill post.
I had to add something to allow my server to post on MoparScape (caps would stop the checking from working).
